summary: A teenage girl fights to protect the last working well in a drought-stricken valley from a greedy water baron.
cast: Haley Lu Richardson|Booboo Stewart|Max Charles|Nicole Arianna Fox|Michael McCartney|Barbara Crampton|Michael Massee|Rena Owen|Leo Lee|Michael Welch|Jon Gries|Jacqueline Emerson|Casey Adams|Sheridan Crist|Neal Polister|Veronica Sixtos|Tooru Nakahira|Fivel Stewart|Zack Duhame|Sarah Pott|James Smale|Jedediah Fossil|Chris Harding|Billy Federighi|Chris Matson|Lorenzo Mezzacappa|Adam Wingard|Simon Barrett|Micah Brenner|Andrew Spieler|Bruce G. Hammock|Dan Hooker|Seong-Jin Moon|Alex Gadd|Corky Cronin|Gene Litvinoff|Shane Leary|Eric A. Reid|Zachary Witherspoon|Brett Snider|Dimitri Loginowski|Bruce Hammock|Lassie Hammock|Michael J. Wilson|Ed Noon|Seth Caplan|Brittany Falardeau|Ayo Griffin|Jacob Forman
title: The Last Survivors
